about_legalese: Licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.0
active_connection_content: This is the current connection address being used by Tautulli Remote.
certificate_verification_failed_content: The certificate for this server could not be authenticated and may be self-signed. Do you want to trust this certificate?
clear_app_image_cache_dialog_content: Are you sure you want to clear the local image cache?
clear_tautulli_image_cache_dialog_conten: Are you sure you want to clear the image cache on {}?
data_dump_warning_line_1: WARNING: This page includes sensitive data.
donate_heading_card_title: Tautulli Remote is free and open source.
donate_heading_card_content: However, any contributions you can make towards the app are appriciated!
error_message_server_version: Server version does not meet requirements
error_suggestion_authorization_required: Server responded with Authorization Required. Verify connection details and headers.
error_suggestion_bad_api_response: The server response was missing required information. Please contact support.
error_suggestion_certificate_expired: Please check your certificate and re-register with your Tautulli server.
error_suggestion_certificate_verificatio: Please re-register with your Tautulli server.
error_suggestion_check_connection_addres: Check your Connection Address for errors.
error_suggestion_invalid_api_key: Check your device token or try generating a new QR code on Tautulli.
error_suggestion_plex_connection: Check your Connection Address for errors and make sure Tautulli can communicate with Plex.
error_suggestion_server_version: Please update the Tautulli server to v{} or greater
help_translate_heading_card_title: Thank you for helping to translate Tautulli Remote!
help_translate_heading_card_content: Your contributions help improve Tautulli Remote and make it accessible to more of the community.
logs_clear_dialog_title: Are you sure you want to clear the Tautulli Remote logs?
logs_empty_filter_message: No logs for the selected filter.
mask_senstivie_info_subtitle: Hides IP addresses and other sensitive info
notification_permission_dialog_content: The notification permission is required to receive notifications.
onesignal_data_privacy_not_accepted_cont: To receive notifications from Tautulli consent to the OneSignal data privacy is required.
onesignal_data_privacy_text_block_2: %OneSignal% is used to deliver notifications from Tautulli. No Personally Identifiable Information (PII) is being collected by OneSignal. Read the %OneSignal Privacy Policy% for more details.
onesignal_data_privacy_text_block_3: Notification data sent through OneSignal's API will be %deleted after ~30 days%.
onesignal_data_privacy_text_block_4: Once you accept, this device will register with OneSignal. Consent can be revoked to prevent further communication with OneSignal.
onesignal_error_registration_message: This device is attempting to register with OneSignal. This process may take up to 2 min.
onesignal_error_registration_title: Device Has Not Registered With OneSignal
onesignal_error_unexpected_message: Please contact Tautulli support for assistance.
onesignal_error_unexpected_title: Unexpected Error With OneSignal Subscription State
onesignal_unreachable_content: In this state notifications will not work and Tautulli Remote will be unable to register with OneSignal.
secondary_connection_address_explanation: The Secondary Connection Address will be used if the Primary Connection Address is unreachable.
This is particularly useful if your public IP address is not accessible inside your network.
server_connection_address_dialog_seconda: Leave blank or enter a valid URL format
server_delete_dialog_title: Are you sure you want to delete '{}'?
server_registration_bullet_one: Open the Tautulli web interface on another device.
server_registration_bullet_two: Navigate to Settings > Tautulli Remote App.
server_registration_bullet_four: Make sure the Tautulli Address is accessible from other devices.
server_registration_exit_dialog_title: Are you sure you want to exit?
server_registration_exit_dialog_content: Any currently entered information will be discarded.
wizard_closing_announcements: Keep an eye on the Announcements page to receive important messages regarding the app.
wizard_closing_notifications: Remember to configure Tautulli Remote as a notification agent in Tautulli under Settings > Notification Agents.
wizard_closing_support: For assistance with issues or to provide feedback, visit the Help & Support links on the Settings page.
wizard_closing_translate: Tautulli Remote supports multiple languages, help translate under Settings > Help Translate.
wizard_onesignal_allow_title: Allow OneSignal to send push notifications
wizard_onesignal_text_1: Tautulli uses OneSignal to send push notifications to Tautulli Remote. The content of these notifications can be encrypted.
wizard_onesignal_text_2: If you would like to receive notifications in this app, please review and accept the OneSignal data privacy below.
wizard_skip_dialog_message_onesignal: You will need to consent to the OneSignal data privacy later if you wish to use Tautulli Remote to receive push notifications.
wizard_skip_dialog_message_servers: You have not yet registered any Tautulli servers.
wizard_skip_dialog_title: Are you sure you want to skip?
wizard_quit_dialog_title: Are you sure you want to quit the Setup Wizard?
wizard_welcome_text_2: Tautulli Remote allows you to view your Plex server activity, history, statistics, and more by connecting to your existing Tautulli server.
wizard_welcome_text_3: Ensure that Tautulli is currently running and accessible from this device before continuing with the setup wizard.
